content: Svargasthhanaaya nyangallude pithaave! / Ninte thirunaamam parishuddhamaakkappedaname. / Ninte raajyam varaname. / Thiruvishdam svargatthileppole bhoomiyilum aakaname. / Nyangallkku aavashyamaaya appam innu nyangallkku tharaname. / Nyangallude kadakkaarodu nyangall kshamichathupole / nyangallude kadangallum paapangallum nyangallodu kshamikkaname. / Pareekshayilekku nyangalle praveshippikkaruthe. / Pinneyo dushdanilninnu nyangalle rakshichukollllaname. / Entennaal raajyavum / shakthiyum/ mahathvavum / enneykkum ninakkullllathaakunnu. Aammeen.
